name: AVPlayer.WaitingReason
desc: The reasons a player is waiting to begin or resume playback.

items.name: static let evaluatingBufferingRate: AVPlayer.WaitingReason
items.desc: The player is waiting because it’s monitoring the buffer’s fill rate to determine whether playback is likely to complete without interruptions.

items.name: static let noItemToPlay: AVPlayer.WaitingReason
items.desc: The player is waiting because there’s no item to play.

items.name: static let toMinimizeStalls: AVPlayer.WaitingReason
items.desc: The player is waiting for appropriate playback conditions before starting playback.

items.name: static let interstitialEvent: AVPlayer.WaitingReason
items.desc: The player is waiting for an interstitial event to complete.

items.name: static let waitingForCoordinatedPlayback: AVPlayer.WaitingReason
items.desc: The player is waiting for another participant in a coordinated playback session.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a waiting reason with a string value.
